traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: X01 can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
entries: X01 has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the hexton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the hexton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: X01 makes one Pincer attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Pincer
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the hexton can't use this tentacle against other targets. X01 has six tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: X01 casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
